rows.title: Support for Children

text_1.eng: This is a toll-free number. It is concerned with providing support to child abuse incidents/ cases together with other children’s needs.

sub_title_2.eng: Mental Health Psychosocial Support for Children

text_2.eng: This is a tollfree number for supporting care givers/parents and children with various challenges together with feeling bad/not being in a good mood for three days, feeling frustrated, if you or child is abused, being threatened, or have feeling of committing suicide.

facilitator_text_2.eng:
**You can also see Social Welfare Officer** in Municipality or Ward office that is within the area of your residence or Community Development Officer in your District/Ward in absence of Social Welfare officer. In addition, you can see local Government leader of your place of stay and these are:
- Ten Cell leaders
- Street Local Government leader/Chairperson
- Police Gender Desk for GBV

rows.title: List of Organizations in Kinondoni District

title.eng: List of Organizations in Kinondoni District

description_1.eng:
**Support provided:** Legal Aid
**Office Location in Dar es Salaam:** Kijitonyama

description_3.eng: **Support provided:** Guidance and Counselling, and Mental Health Psychosocial Support Services

description_4.eng:
**Support Provided:** Guidance and Counselling

**Office Location in Dar es Salaam:** Mwanayamala

text_4.eng: This is a toll-free number. It is concerning with providing support to child abuse incidents/ cases together with other children’s needs.

sub_title_5.eng: PASADA (Pastoral Services for People living with HIV & AIDS Dar es salaam Archdiocese)

description_5.eng:
**Support provided:** Guidance and Counselling For People living with HIV & AIDS, OVC f& Families, Child Protections Support Services,
HIV & AIDS Support Services ( Care and Treatment for HIV infected People), Home Based Care Services, Palliative Care Services,
Orphans and Vulnerable Services, Cervical Cancer Testing, PMTCT Support Services (Prevention of Mother to Child Transmission of HIV) and GBV &VAC SUPPORT Services

**Office Location in Dar es Salaam:** Chang”ombe Head quarter and all church hospitals in all  Five Dar es salaam Municipalities
